scripts.start: STRATEGY_KLINE=binance SYMBOL=BNBUSDT INTERVAL=15m MARKET=spot LIMIT=500 node --loader ts-node/esm boot.ts
scripts.dev: STRATEGY_KLINE=binance SYMBOL=COAI INTERVAL=1m MARKET=futures LIMIT=500 node --watch --loader ts-node/esm boot.ts
scripts.generateCsv: STRATEGY_KLINE=binance SYMBOL=BNBUSDT INTERVAL=1m MARKET=spot LIMIT=1000 START_TIME= END_TIME= node --loader ts-node/esm generateCsv.ts
scripts.backTest: SYMBOL=BNBUSDT INTERVAL=1m MARKET=spot node --loader ts-node/esm backTest.js
